message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, but with the inflation, this is more fair going forward. Do you agree?
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think I should get a bit more
This back and forth isn't helping anyone. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. A 50/50 split is the fairest option considering the inflation.
